title: Autism
description: Resources from Immunize.org, CDC, and our immunization partners about school vaccination, including links to NASN, ASTHO, and CDC consent forms.
cleaned_text: | || | | | Autism | | |Claims that vaccines cause autism have led some parents to delay or refuse vaccines for their children. The most common claims are that autism is caused by MMR vaccine, vaccines that contain thimerosal, or too many vaccines. Many scientific studies have been done to test these claims.
